a) Transportation: ii. Privately leased or owned automobile. If travel is by automobile, the owner/lessee of the automobile shall be reimbursed for each mile actually driven by the most direct route at the rate of 36.5 cents per mile (or such other amount as the Internal Revenue Service may from time to time authorize). Total reimbursement resulting from travel, including mileage, lodging while in route, and/or actual automobile expenses shall not exceed the coach airfare allowance. iii Other forms of travel: Modes of transportation other than by automobile or air travel shall be reimbursable up to coach airfare allowance.
